summary: IN THE HOT MONTHS THE DASH BOARD MELTS, AND BECOMES EXTREMELY STICKY. ONCE MELTED, THE DASH REFLECTS LIGHT COMING THROUGH THE WINDSHIELD AND BECOMES SUPER REFLECTIVE AND BRIGHT CAUSING VISIBILITY ISSUES THAT ARE ALMOST BLINDING AT CERTAIN POINTS OF THE DAY.  IT IS EXTREMELY DANGEROUS AND A SAFETY ISSUE. THIS STARTED ROUGHLY FOUR OR FIVE YEARS AGO AND HAS GOTTEN PROGRESSIVELY WORSE.
